data.name: Becoming Omega
data.detailed_description:
A FRESH TAKE ON ACTION ROLE PLAYING GAMES.
Awaken, and seek to destroy the Dark for the Artifact within is the key to Becoming the Omega Deity and reigning true.

• An Unforgiving World to Discover
An Unforgiving world where open fields brings danger and not even the sky is safe. As you Travel, the fear of combat with Unknown Deities and Unrelenting Darkness awaits you, leading to a sense of True Power When Defeating your opponents

• Become a God
You can Customize the appearance of your God, Also freely combine the weapon stances, armor, and Divinities (Magicks) that you equip. You can develop your GOD according to your play style, such as increasing your Agility to become an Untouchable Blade Dancer, and/or Mastering Mana Force and being able to wreak havoc with Magic.

• An Ever Growing Story
An Evolving Dynamic story told in small fragments. An epic journey in which you will discover many dark secrets about the World and Citizens of Zavos.

• Expanding Online Play
In the future there will be an addition to the base game in the form of 8 player multiplayer, where you can directly connect with other players and train together, as well as Hosting a dedicated server for up to 64 players and join your friends in Pantheon Wars

A FRESH TAKE ON ACTION ROLE PLAYING GAMES.
Awaken, and seek to destroy the Dark for the Artifact within is the key to Becoming the Omega Deity and reigning true.

• Become a God
You can Customize the appearance of your God, Also freely combine the weapon stances, armor, and Divinities (Magicks) that you equip. You can develop your GOD according to your play style, such as increasing your Agility to become an Untouchable Blade Dancer, and/or Mastering Mana Force and being able to wreak havoc with Magic.

• An Ever Growing Story
An Evolving Dynamic story told in small fragments. An epic journey in which you will discover many dark secrets about the World and Citizens of Zavos.

• Expanding Online Play
In the future there will be an addition to the base game in the form of 8 player multiplayer, where you can directly connect with other players and train together, as well as Hosting a dedicated server for up to 64 players and join your friends in Pantheon Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7-9700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
